description:
Cryptocurrencies have developed rapidly in recent years, its user base has continued to expand, and the form has become closer to the traditional financial market. At the same time, the needs of a more professional app for gathering all the information and holding a user community have become quite substantial.

Our app, CoinView, is the world’s best FREE bitcoin and cryptocurrency portfolio management app, with support for 2,400 cryptocurrencies. Join the crypto elite and track your entire portfolio in one place, get detailed price and market information, and receive alerts to stay ahead.

With a total number of 10,000,000,000 Super CoinView Token (SCV) minted, SCV will run on Ethereum blockchain and will be ERC20 compatible. It allows SCV to work with existing Ethereum infrastructures such as SDKs (software development kits), wallets and exchanges. The total supply of SCV is fixed and will never be increased.
name: Super CoinView Token
